|                                                                            |
|  Takida is a five-piece rock band from mid Sweden who started out in 1999  |
|  and they have worked hard to get where they are today. They have been     |
|  touring all around Sweden and earned a reputation as a solid live rock    |
|  act.                                                                      |
|                                                                            |
|  Their first demo, "Old" was recorded in 2000. The result was a 5-track    |
|  CD and only 500 copies were pressed, selling out immediately. With many   |
|  successful gigs and increased popularity among fans the band were able    |
|  to release some material on their own, including four EP's and one full   |
|  album, which have sold 10.000 copies between them.                        |
|                                                                            |

|  ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œBury The Lies was pretty hard to record due to a lack of time,           |
